TopicTitle: Resolution to big, and can't get to the "Apply" button to change...

Articles.Content: When I open the game, it is HUGE, and I cant see the bottom, where some of the stuff goes on, and where the "Apply" button is for changing the resolution, or just fixing this. Is there a textfile or something I can change in the folder or something such as to fix?
Yep, you can change the resolution by opening up the settings.cfg file in a text editor (avoid Wordpad; use Notepad or a more sophisticated editor of your preference).
Also, you can force the game into full screen mode to see the apply button. Cmd+F on OSX or whatever it is for Windows/Linux.
